segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate—what a balancing act!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying dishes like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
